cause.description:
This is not only for camp but ReSeArCh
Each and everyday children globally suffer from many types of cancer, Many of us do our best in helping these children fight this horrendous disease, we could visit them love them support them, and offer what we have to help with costs this foundation is named after my late father who may have lost the battle to the disease a few years ago but, even in his own state he help give confidence back to a child with the disease also
1. we must continue helping them on their fight
2. we must help these children as much as we can
3. we must never give up
cause.mission: Raise money to help support children with cancer This cause supports the american cancer foundation in helping children with cancer go to camp
cause.name: William James Edward BLaine Fight against Cancer Foundation
